deficiencies.deficiency: PERSONNEL REQUIREMENTS-Facility personnel shall be competent to provide the services necessary to meet individual client needs and shall, at all times, be employed in numbers necessary to meet such needs. Facilty was under staffed to meet the cleints needs per cleints behaviors and per facilty staff, staff to client ratio should have been 3:1 per facilty staff and Administrator.

RESPONSIBILITY FOR PROVIDING CARE AND SUPERVISION-The licensee shall provide care and supervision as necessary to meet the client's needs.  Facilty staff failed to notify biological mother when dropping of client for a home visit. As a result cleint AWOL from drop off point.
